meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.enactingFormula: (Made by the Director of Agriculture, Fisheries and Conservation under section 47(1) of the Rabies Ordinance (Cap. 421))

section.name: s1
section.heading: Commencement
section.content: This Notice comes into operation on 1 August 2025.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Exemption for keepers of certain legally imported dogs

subsection.leadIn: Subsection (2) applies to a dog that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: is imported into Hong Kong under and in accordance with a permit issued under section 12 of the Rabies Regulation (Cap. 421 sub. leg. A) (Cap. 421A) on or after the commencement date* of this Notice;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: has been vaccinated against rabies; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: is implanted with the device specified in the Schedule.

subsection.content: The keeper of the dog is exempt from the application of section 28(2) of Cap. 421A in relation to the dog.

paragraph.content: A transponder that conforms to the International Standards ISO 11784 and ISO 11785 published by the International Organization for Standardization, and when activated by an electromagnetic radio frequency signal, responds with a coded signal revealing a unique numeric identification code in the following format—
where each X is an individual numeric symbol.
